mapper.sql: t.id, t.account_id, t.name, t.sex, t.age, t.Column_12, t.telephone, t.mobilephone, t.job, t.qq, t.wechat, t.microblog, t.email, t.office_addr, t.ctime, t.creater, t.creater_id, t.etime, t.editor, t.editor_id, t.comments, t.deleted
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO sys_user ( account_id , name , sex , age , Column_12 , telephone , mobilephone , job , qq , wechat , microblog , email , office_addr , ctime , creater , creater_id , etime , editor , editor_id , comments , deleted ) VALUES ( #{accountId}, #{name}, #{sex}, #{age}, #{column12}, #{telephone}, #{mobilephone}, #{job}, #{qq}, #{wechat}, #{microblog}, #{email}, #{officeAddr}, #{ctime}, #{creater}, #{createrId}, #{etime}, #{editor}, #{editorId}, #{comments}, 0 )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS id

INSERT INTO sys_user ( account_id , name , sex , age , Column_12 , telephone , mobilephone , job , qq , wechat , microblog , email , office_addr , ctime , creater , creater_id , etime , editor , editor_id , comments , deleted ) VALUES <foreach collection="list" item="item" index="index" separator=","> ( #{accountId}, #{name}, #{sex}, #{age}, #{column12}, #{telephone}, #{mobilephone}, #{job}, #{qq}, #{wechat}, #{microblog}, #{email}, #{officeAddr}, #{ctime}, #{creater}, #{createrId}, #{etime}, #{editor}, #{editorId}, #{comments}, 0 ) </foreach>
mapper.update:
UPDATE sys_user SET deleted=1 WHERE deleted=0 AND id IN
#{id}

UPDATE sys_user
account_id = #{accountId},
name = #{name},
sex = #{sex},
age = #{age},
Column_12 = #{column12},
telephone = #{telephone},
mobilephone = #{mobilephone},
job = #{job},
qq = #{qq},
wechat = #{wechat},
microblog = #{microblog},
email = #{email},
office_addr = #{officeAddr},
ctime = #{ctime},
creater = #{creater},
creater_id = #{createrId},
etime = #{etime},
editor = #{editor},
editor_id = #{editorId},
comments = #{comments},
deleted = #{deleted},
WHERE deleted=0 AND id = #{id}
